product_name: Scott Scott Contessa Speedster 25 Women's Bike - 2014
long_description: The Scott Contessa Speedster 25 women's road bike offers a swift, sporty ride, economical Shimano Tiagra components and 30 versatile speeds to ensure you're pedaling easily through the miles. Double-butted 6061 aluminum frame offers sleek, responsive performance. Carbon fork with alloy steerer tube reduces weight and helps smooth out energy-draining road vibrations. You'll find the right gear for any road thanks to the triple Shimano Tiagra crankset paired with a wide-ranging 12-30 cassette for 30 easy-spinning gear combinations. Shimano Tiagra derailleurs and shifters offer precise shifts and dependable performance. Syncro Race 27 rims are wrapped with Schwalbe Lugano tires to deliver great road feel, high grip and low rolling resistance. Please note: pedals are not included. Specs on the Scott Contessa Speedster 25 women's road bike are subject to change.
short_description: The Scott Contessa Speedster 25 women's road bike offers a swift, sporty ride, economical Shimano Tiagra components and 30 versatile speeds to ensure you're pedaling easily through the miles.
